text: Had several issues with the ASUS TUF Gaming FX705DT Gaming and Entertainment Laptop (AMD Ryzen 7 3750H 4-Core, 8GB RAM, 512GB PCIe SSD, 17.3" Full HD (1920x1080), NVIDIA GTX 1650, Wifi, Bluetooth, Webcam, 2xUSB 3.0, Win 10 Pro) since day one. performance throttles under load and the speakers feels cheap. Performance in streaming games is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Had several issues with the ASUS TUF Gaming FX705DT Gaming and Entertainment Laptop (AMD Ryzen 7 3750H 4-Core, 8GB RAM, 512GB PCIe SSD, 17.3" Full HD (1920x1080), NVIDIA GTX 1650, Wifi, Bluetooth, Webcam, 2xUSB 3.0, Win 10 Pro) since day one. performance throttles under load and the build material feels cheap. Performance in content creation and gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Avoid the ASUS TUF Gaming FX705DT Gaming and Entertainment Laptop (AMD Ryzen 7 3750H 4-Core, 8GB RAM, 512GB PCIe SSD, 17.3" Full HD (1920x1080), NVIDIA GTX 1650, Wifi, Bluetooth, Webcam, 2xUSB 3.0, Win 10 Pro) if you can. The NVIDIA GTX 1650 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. The chassis feels surprisingly flimsy for the price.. Looking to return it.

Had several issues with the ASUS TUF Gaming FX705DT Gaming and Entertainment Laptop (AMD Ryzen 7 3750H 4-Core, 8GB RAM, 512GB PCIe SSD, 17.3" Full HD (1920x1080), NVIDIA GTX 1650, Wifi, Bluetooth, Webcam, 2xUSB 3.0, Win 10 Pro) since day one. Wi-Fi drops intermittently and the keyboard feels cheap. Performance in gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the ASUS TUF Gaming FX705DT Gaming and Entertainment Laptop (AMD Ryzen 7 3750H 4-Core, 8GB RAM, 512GB PCIe SSD, 17.3" Full HD (1920x1080), NVIDIA GTX 1650, Wifi, Bluetooth, Webcam, 2xUSB 3.0, Win 10 Pro). It Wi-Fi drops intermittently frequently when playing Elden Ring, and the performance throttles significantly. The port selection has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.
